attributes.action: Call an immediate Election as the Prime Minister and Labour are unfit to Govern
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has been unwilling to accept any blame for the role of bankers and his involvement in easing the regulation of Banks. His cabinet and party are unfit to govern. It's time to let the UK population decide the fitness and properness of the current Government. If changes are needed let the people decide now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
